text.config.systemsapi.title: SystemsAPI
text.config.systemsapi.option.baseClickD:
The base delay in milliseconds between navigation clicks.
If, the importer is getting things wrong, you should increase this.
text.config.systemsapi.option.menuTimeou: The time in milliseconds that the importer will wait for a menu to open before throwing an error.
text.config.systemsapi.option.menuItemLo: The time in milliseconds that the importer will wait for a menu to fully load before throwing an error.
text.config.systemsapi.option.menuItemTi: The time in milliseconds that the importer will wait to receive an item before throwing an error.
text.config.systemsapi.option.previousIn: The time in milliseconds that the importer will wait to receive a previous input throwing an error.
